original_title: The Golden Age of Porn: Hyapatia Lee
overview: It is not hyperbole to say that Hyapatia Lee might be the most beautiful woman to grace the stage of porn. This American Indian beauty is stunning even today, two generations after her spotlight in the adult industry. Impossible to forget, Hyapatia is a true legend!!!!!
title: The Golden Age of Porn: Hyapatia Lee
